BroadcastChannel.summary: The BroadcastChannel interface represents a named channel that any {{glossary("browsing context")}} of a given {{glossary("origin")}} can subscribe to. It allows communication between different documents (in different windows, tabs, frames or iframes) of the same origin. Messages are broadcasted via a event fired at all BroadcastChannel objects listening to the channel, except the object that sent the message.
